Docs.summary: Provides an implementation of the XxHash64 algorithm.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The XxHash64 algorithm supports an optional seed value. Instances created with this constructor use the default seed, zero.
